name: restInitApplication
description: Scans all the CFCs in dirPath, and places those that are REST enabled at the serviceMapping URL. Requires the web admin password under Lucee.

params.name: dirPath
params.description: The path to a folder of CFCs to scan. Should be a full file system path

params.name: serviceMapping
params.description: The root of the exposed API, minus the server-wide prefix. E.g. to expose at '/rest/api/' you should set this to 'api'.

params.name: default
params.description: If the mapping is a default mapping set this to true (Lucee only)

params.name: password
params.description: The password for the web admin (Lucee only)
